data.name: Level Tank
data.detailed_description:
Blast your way through swarms of enemies in this action-packed top-down shooter. Upgrade your tank, collect power-ups, and explore diverse maps while surviving against a wide variety of enemies in multiple different game modes!

Wishlist now!

Game modes

You will never get bored with 27 game modes to choose from!

  • 3 standard game modes!
  • 24 unlockable challenge modes!

Each game mode consists of 5 difficulty levels suited for players of all skill levels!

Maps

Explore 20+ unique maps in the mysterious world of Level Tank!

Enemies

Survive against a large variety of randomly selected enemies and bosses. You may encounter a new threat each time you play!

Upgrades

Progressively upgrade your tank to increase your odds of survival!

Power-ups

Collect awesome power-ups for a fun, temporary power boost!

Abilities

Choose a special ability to help you survive against the never-ending swarm of enemies!

Objectives

Some game modes include simple objectives for added challenge and fun!

Customization

Customize your tank by unlocking 50 different skins and plenty of color options!

Level System

Level up from playing to unlock new maps, game modes, skins, and other epic rewards!

Achievements

Challenge yourself and attempt over 100 achievements! Will you achieve them all?

Leaderboards

Play casually or try to take the #1 spot on one of the many online leaderboards!

data.short_description: Blast your way through swarms of enemies in this action-packed top-down shooter. Upgrade your tank, collect power ups, and survive against a wide variety of enemies while exploring diverse maps in multiple different game modes! How long will you last before getting overrun?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Generation
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Integrated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
